attributes.action: Ban overcrowding on transports services due to coronavirus pandemic
attributes.additional_details: people in the UK are not listening to the rules so please change the Rules
attributes.background: Put restrictions in place for transport services

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about overcrowding on public transport during the Covid-19 outbreak, but it's not clear exactly what you want the Government to ban, as there is no set definition of overcrowding.

You could start a new petition stating more clearly what restrictions you want the Government to impose on public transport during the outbreak.

The Government has published Covid-19 guidance for transport operators, which outlines the importance of social distancing and other mitigations: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/coronavirus-covid-19-safer-transport-guidance-for-operators/coronavirus-covid-19-safer-transport-guidance-for-operators#social-distancing
